entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit customer support. My name is Velma. How can I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I need to return something. This is ridiculous. I bought a VeloBand Pulse a little over two weeks ago, and it's just not working out for me.
I understand your frustration. I can certainly help you with a return. Could you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with your VeloFit account?
It's [customer's email address]. And hurry it up, I don't have all day. This VeloBand Pulse is just a piece of junk. It keeps disconnecting.

Thank you. I've located your order. I see you purchased the VeloBand Pulse 15 days ago. Our standard return policy allows for returns up to 90 days from the date of purchase. So, you're well within that window.
90 days? Seriously? Okay, good. I thought I was going to be stuck with this thing. I just want to send it back and get my money back.
Absolutely. To initiate the return, I'll need to send you a prepaid shipping label. Please confirm your shipping address. Is it still [customer’s shipping address]?
Yes, that's correct. Send the label there. And make sure I get the full refund. This VeloBand Pulse was a complete waste of money. I should have bought a better smart watch from somewhere else.

I understand your disappointment with the VeloBand Pulse. Once we receive the returned item, we'll process a full refund to your original method of payment. You'll receive the shipping label via email within the next hour. Just repackage the VeloBand Pulse securely in its original packaging, if possible, attach the label, and drop it off at any authorized shipping location.
Okay, great. So, I just print out the label, stick it on the box, and send it back? And I'll get my money back within, like, a week?
Yes, that's correct. Please allow 7 to 10 days for the refund to be processed after we receive the item. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, I think that's it. Thanks for your help. I was really worried I'd be stuck with this thing since I thought the return policy was only 10 days! Glad you said it's 90 days.
You're very welcome! We appreciate your business and hope you'll give VeloFit another chance in the future. Have a great day!
